solution_line_template: Frank has ${one_dollar_total} in one dollar bills because {one_dollar_bills} x {one_dollar_value} = <<{one_dollar_bills}*{one_dollar_value}={one_dollar_total}>>{one_dollar_total}
Frank has ${five_dollar_total} in five dollar bills because {five_dollar_bills} x {five_dollar_value} = <<{five_dollar_bills}*{five_dollar_value}={five_dollar_total}>>{five_dollar_total}
Frank has ${ten_dollar_total} in ten dollar bills because {ten_dollar_bills} x {ten_dollar_value} = <<{ten_dollar_bills}*{ten_dollar_value}={ten_dollar_total}>>{ten_dollar_total}

Frank has {total_money} dollars in total because {one_dollar_total} + {five_dollar_total} + {ten_dollar_total} + {twenty_dollar_total} = <<{one_dollar_total}+{five_dollar_total}+{ten_dollar_total}+{twenty_dollar_total}={total_money}>>{total_money}
Frank bought {pounds_bought} pounds of peanuts because {money_spent} / {price_per_pound} = <<{money_spent}/{price_per_pound}={pounds_bought}>>{pounds_bought}
He eats {average_per_day} pounds a day on average because {pounds_bought} / {days_in_week} = <<{pounds_bought}/{days_in_week}={average_per_day}>>{average_per_day}
